column1: The Pit Room////The best BBQ I've ever had. You order your food cafeteria style but they've got a huge variety and rotational sides (I had the okra
column2: but another option was a tomato/cucumber salad). The staff is super friendly and one old guy noticed I had forgotten to grab silverware by the register as I was filling up my drink (citrus infused green tea) and said
column3: "you ain't got nothin' to fight with son!" as he handed me some utensils. As we sat down to eat Merle Haggard started playing on the radio. Goddamn I love Texas (and this restaurant).
